testcase.classname: Kullanıcı, Profile Image den "Change Username" button una access i olmalıdır.
testcase.name: In the admin panel's sidebar, under the "Fees Collection" menu, the "Fees Master" page link should be displayed, and when clicked, it should redirect to the "feemaster" page. - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out:
Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed Then User enters the "parent100" and "wonderworld123" and clicks the Login Button..passed When User must have an access to "Change Username" button from Profile Picture.undefined ======= <testsuite name="Cucumber" time="26.465" tests="1" skipped="0" failures="1" errors="0"> <testcase classname="Bir Kullanici olarak Student Panel e giris yaptiktan sonra password u Change Password sayfasindan değiştirebilmeliyim." name="When the user enters the correct password combination in the new password, "password has been changed successfully." should receive your message" time="25.701"> <failure type="java.lang.AssertionError"> <![CDATA[java.lang.AssertionError at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:87) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:42) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:53) at stepdefinitions.Student.the_user_verifies_that_the_password_has_been_changed_successfully_message_has_been_received_because_the_correct_password_combination_has_been_entered(Student.java:133) at ✽.The user verifies that the password has been changed successfully message has been received because the correct password combination has been entered(file:///C:/Users/ACER/IdeaProjects/TEAM11_wonderworldcollegee/src/test/resources/features/US_044.feature:60)
Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When The user clicks Student Login button on wonder world college page......passed When The user enters valid username in Username textbox on User Login page..passed When The user enters valid password in Password textbox on User Login page..passed When The user clicks Sing In buton..........................................passed When The user clicks profile image on the opened page.......................passed When The user clicks the Change Password button in the drop-down menu.......passed When The user types the current password into the Current Password textbox on the Change Password page.passed When The user types a new password in the New Password textbox on the Change Password page, not less than six characters, with the correct password combination containing uppercase letters and one special character.passed When The user correctly retypes the newly created password into the Confirm Password textbox on the Change Password page.passed When The user clicks save button on Change Password page....................passed Then The user verifies that the password has been changed successfully message has been received because the correct password combination has been entered.failed >>>>>>> main And User closes the page....................................................skipped
